mapper.select: select password from sys_user_info where user_id = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: update sys_user_info set password = #{passwordnew} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.permission_id, a.parent_id, a.`name` AS title, a.icon, a.href, a.type, a.target FROM sys_permission_info a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.`status` = '0' AND a.type < 3 AND EXISTS ( SELECT rp.permission_id FROM sys_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN sys_role_info ri ON ( rp.role_id = ri.role_id ) WHERE ri.del_flag = '0' AND ri.`status` = '0' AND EXISTS ( SELECT ur.role_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND rp.role_id = ur.role_id ) AND a.permission_id = rp.permission_id ) ORDER BY a.type, a.sort, a.permission_id
